Looking for early baseball CdVs, with a Lowells team CdV of particular interest.

Posted By: barrysloate
I will check my inventory.  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Posted By: Gary Passamonte
Barry, Time is precious and I've decided to spend more time doing the things I like.  Collecting CdVs is one of my likes.  Thanks for your friendship through the years.

Posted By: John Wondowski
Gary,

I have a cabinet and the corresponding 18 CDVs of the 1870 Lincoln Baseball Club featuring Clarence Lexow.  Please email if you are interested.

Thanks,

John
